meanings.definition: A group of serine proteases that are involved in the breakdown of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The kallikreins help in breaking down proteins in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study kallikreins to understand how proteins are broken down.
meanings.sent3: When the kallikreins went on strike, the proteins didn't know what to do!
meanings.sent4: The kallikreins are like tiny scissors cutting through the protein strands.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the kallikreins as little protein-eating machines!

meanings.definition: Enzymes that play a role in blood pressure regulation.
meanings.sent1: Kallikreins help control blood pressure levels in the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how kallikreins affect blood pressure regulation.
meanings.sent3: The kallikreins threw a party to celebrate keeping blood pressure in check!
meanings.sent4: In the body's orchestra, kallikreins are the conductors of blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: Visualize the kallikreins as tiny regulators of the body's blood flow!

meanings.definition: Proteins that are found in the human body.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies contain various kallikreins that help with different functions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the kallikreins present in the human body.
meanings.sent3: The kallikreins in our bodies are like the secret agents of proteins!
meanings.sent4: The kallikreins are the building blocks of our body's protein structure.
meanings.sent5: Think of the kallikreins as the essential workers of our body's protein world!
